meanings.definition: The straight part of a racetrack opposite the grandstand.
meanings.sent1: During the race, the horses sprinted down the backstretch towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: Fans cheered as the horses thundered down the backstretch of the racetrack.
meanings.sent3: The jockey's hat flew off as they raced down the backstretch, causing laughter in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The backstretch of the track seemed endless, like a never-ending road to victory.
meanings.sent5: The sun set beautifully over the backstretch, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
